name: [Invisipong]
description:
Invisipong was created within 24h for MiniLD #58.

The theme was 'Pong'.

So I decided to create a pongstyle-game with a simple twist - the ball is invisible. To make up for that, the ball makes noise and can be spoted by listening carefully.

Either stereo-speakers or headphones are required.

The game has keyboard aswell as gamepad support.
